Author: Ishchenko D.O.

Start date : 10.8.2021
End date : 
Exercise: Determine the minimum value n > 0 for which 
the next term does not exceed ?> 0 in absolute value when finding the result
according to the formula : 
  n
  _     3¦
  >  ÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄ  x¦
  Ä  4¦(a+2)!
 a=1
